title: Account got Hacked, email got changed to ***@163.com, Now, I am Suspended, What Can I DO?!!!!
body:
I was playing fine ytd, And I just brought Kayn and ready for the icon trial.

And today When I try Login to League, It got me suspended!

WTF? and when i login to lol.com, i find out my account email got changed to some sort of ***@163.com

WTF?! I cant even change it back cuz it ask for email PASSCODE!!!!

WTF?!!! They hacked and changed my email without any email notice and now I have to get u passcode????

Riot, I really want my account BACK, I Dont Think I can play from 0 again, I have spend like 4 years on this acc.

Please help me. I trust you. I have faith in you.

replies.body: Indeed, our account team may ask a few questions to verify ownership before restoring access.  Glad to hear you have your account back, and everything is okay now!

Yes! I have the same question! My E-mail adrees is changed to *******@163.com!  Now I can't change back and login to game!

Please fix it, or tell us what can we do!

I have request a ticket on this issue in LoL support page.
like after a day, they replied me with a lot of question to verify my creator identity,
and now i get my ac back

I love u Riot{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
